name: html5-youtube-everywhere
title: HTML5 YouTube Everywhere
description: Replace the old Flash based embedded YouTube videos with HTML5 iframes and force existing iframes to use the HTML5 player.
author: Riku-Pekka Silvola

preferences.name: yt-clicktoplay-ext
preferences.title: Click to play
preferences.description: Do not automatically start playing videos

preferences.name: yt-html-youtube
preferences.title: Enable on YouTube
preferences.description: Replaces player on YouTube with an iFrame

preferences.name: yt-experimental-playlist
preferences.title: Enable Experimental support for playlists on YouTube
preferences.description: Replaces playlist on YouTube with an iFrame
